intent.situation: A local cartel has managed to source anti-aircraft weapons which are being delivered to the port of Cristobal via the cargo ship MV Panamax. These weapons represent an unacceptable threat to the local authorities.
intent.mission: PMC Gundogs have been tasked with the interception of these munitions at the port, and their delivery into Agency hands.
intent.constraints: No use of lethal force, except if fired upon by Cartel forces. The munitions cannot be destroyed on site to to high risk of collateral damage. The operation is to remain covert, and should not leave any traces connecting it to the Agency

task.description: Identify which container the munitions are being stored in.
task.logic: REQUIRED: MIKE to hack manifest locally at the harbor master office.

task.description: Entry to, or removal of, target container from the freighter Panamax, and securing the target AA munitions inside.

task.logic: Requires DAVE to secure vehicle or SAM to negotiate lease.

task.description: Transport of munitions through customs security.
task.logic: REQUIRED: munitions will have to pass through the customs checkpoint, so the team will need to work out a solution for that.

task.description: Handover of munitions at agency handover point at town plaza.

intent.intel: - There are several container trucks at the maintenance_hangar, which have recently been repaired. - The Rusty Anchor is a frequent drinking place for crane operators. - The security team at the gate also doubles as the port fire crew. - the computer system an the Harbour master office contains an electronic copy of the Panamx's manifest, including container loadout. - The container is officially being shipped to the San Rafael missionary, and is described as containing a donation of church fitments from Florida.
intent.timeline: Mission to commence at 0500 - arrival time of the MV Panamax. Cartel due to arrive to collect munitions at 0600.

unit.name: SAM
unit.traits: Cynical, logical, fluent in six languages. Hates "Mission Creep."

unit.name: DAVE
unit.traits: Surly, brief, PTSD-hardened. Requires clear Rules of Engagement.

unit.name: MIKE
unit.traits: Hyper-focused, tech-obsessed, relies on heavy caffeine. Easily distracted by 'clean' signals.
